We've fixed various bugs in this release and added additional features, including:
• Swipe for more articles: Swipe left to view the next article
• Font Size: Adjust the font size for the app from the app settings menu
• Multiple video support: S

This app release includes bug fixes and additional features:
• Embedded Tweets will display in the app.
• Embedded Instagram posts will display in the app.
• Better support for photo only articles.
